field.name: Enable OraSRS Integration
field.help: Enable integration with OraSRS v2.0 threat intelligence network

field.name: API Endpoint
field.help: URL of the OraSRS API endpoint (e.g., https://api.orasrs.example.com)

field.name: API Key
field.help: API key for authenticating with OraSRS service

field.name: Update Interval (seconds)
field.help: How often to fetch new threat intelligence (default: 300 seconds)

field.name: Block Malicious IPs
field.help: Automatically block IPs flagged as malicious by OraSRS

field.name: Log Threats
field.help: Log threats detected by OraSRS to system logs

field.name: Credibility Threshold
field.help: Minimum credibility score for blocking (0.0 to 1.0, default: 0.7)

field.name: Enable CISA AIS Feed
field.help: Enable integration with CISA AIS upstream threat feed
